metadata.title: CVE-2023-40477 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
RARLAB WinRAR Recovery Volume Improper Validation of Array Index RemoteCode Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40477` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rar - 2:6.23-1
No subscription required

libunrar-headers - 1:6.2.10-1
libunrar5 - 1:6.2.10-1
unrar - 1:6.2.10-1
No subscription required

clamav-testfiles-rar - 1.0.3-1
libclamunrar - 1.0.3-1
libclamunrar11 - 1.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rar package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:6.23-1').
unrar-nonfree package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:6.2.10-1').
libclamunrar package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.3-1').
